Articles.Content:
... Space *folds* and I am alone. 

Darkness.

Brightness.

Nothing.

Something.

A single point of light.

Existance.

Extending into Infinity.

Infinite points of Light.

Infinite points of Reality

The Multiverse
Junior trips on my body

> 
> \*static\* this is \*cough, cough\* Sampa, there was a bomb placed on the computer...incendiary, If you can hear me, don't worry about me or my ship \*labored breathing\*, just GET XANNARI...

I'm alright over here, sir. Computer, send me a 011 perimeter through the wreckage. No one is there. Now for a story...

The bulkheads around the exit are fused, and I can't get them out. I'll see if I can stop the reaction from in here.

**Shuts off comms, and uses the electrodynamic properties of 011 atoms to deprive the reaction of fuel, making it stop.**

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> I continue to pummel Xannari! FEEL PAIN!

[seriously, what are you doing...]
I'm DESTROYING YOU!

The ringed galaxy gives off another pulse, this time covering a bit of the galaxy where the fighting takes place. The ship Dark Junior and "Xannari" are placed on gets cut in half by a "dead pixel", right between them two. After that, the glowing line disappears, and the ring starts growing, growing and growing, until it becomes a sphere completely enclosing the previously ringed galaxy.

[Dark Junior, I think that you're beating empty space. Xannari is not on the same ship you are on, I think]

I float towards one of the lights. I hold it in my hand. So this is it. Everything around us. The Universe. I look closely, and see a galaxy out of many, a star out of many. I *fold* the star. It disappears.
Another clone?
I look closer. There is a piece of metal. So tiny. So insignificant. But something in me remembers something about that piece of metal. There is someone on it. *Sampa*Ã¢â‚¬â€¹.
Suddenly my body gives out and I fall to the ground. CAUSE: UNKNOWN

I reach down and *fold* the space around him. I pinch off the piece of reality.

- - - Updated - - -

I pull it towards me. I rip the space out of The Universe, and bring it into the Multiverse.

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa is in the Multiverse

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa is in the Multiverse

- - - Updated - - -

Sampa is in the Multiverse
My body can't move and my consciousness is fading. Help me!

Another life-form

*Junior*

I pull reality towards me.

He erupts in the Multiverse

- - - Updated - - -

*Omnipotence*
What? finally, I lose all signs of consciousness. My condition worsens.

Yet another life-form.

*Xannari*

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹The enemy.
Please help me. My body is incapacitated.

> 
> What? finally, I lose all signs of consciousness. My condition worsens.

You are now an omnipotent being in the Multiverse
But, I liked being mortal!
Computer, \*cough, cough\* activate shields

There is a galaxy, one out of many. It *folds.*

And I didn't do it.
Sampa, rush my body to a med bay!

> 
> Computer, \*cough, cough\* activate shields

You are also Omnipotent

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Sampa, rush my body to a med bay!

> 
> But, I liked being mortal!

But it you are now in the Multiverse

- - - Updated - - -

Would you like to be put back?
I slowly limp to junior's side bringing him back to conciousness

Yes! Please!

- - - Updated - - -

What happened to me? any idea?

Glowing magenta lines start appearing on the colossal sphere. And more, and more, until it's completely covered in an intricate cirquit-ish pattern. Then, another pulse, which now goes in all directions in the universe. Every galaxy, including the fighting one, starts sprouting "dead pixels", and some disappear immediately. The universe is failing. The universe is falling apart. The universe is falling. Xannari gets enclosed inside a "dead pixel", unreachable by any means. By all measures, that place in the galaxy no longer exists, but still exists.

> 
> Yes! Please!
> - - - Updated - - -
> 
> What happened to me? any idea?

But why. You will perish out there

- - - Updated - - -

You went unconscious because I pulled your mind into the Multiverse
